body:
I must admit. I **never** thought we'd be fighting on the same side. With your Nazi prejudice, fact denial, ad hominem, emotionally based arguments; I thought you were one of them. 

But when they banned me without cause (again, they lied about the reason) you called them out and held them to task. There clearly was a bias, and I was really surprised at how well you stuck to your guns about it, you defiantly told the truth and cited facts that they couldn't escape. You and many others lead the charge that caused them to have to duck and cover, lie, and ultimately abuse the banhammer to silence dissent. This was the fight that I was fighting, the pursuit of truth. (That's actually why I went with this name, to smoke out the free speech fakers). 

I was watching the entire time, silenced by another fraudulent ban. You hit them broadside with facts. I watched them reel and try to think of ways to intimidate and silence. You stood your ground brilliantly, despite ally after ally falling victim to their administrative abuse. Thank you for your hard work, honesty, and dedication. 

And as much as you don't want to hear it, I did find out one thing. 

(They're [Jewish](https://ruqqus.com/+DumpsterFire/post/5uh3/new-users-see-the-following-screen/kib3?context=3) )
body_html:
I must admit. I never thought we'd be fighting on the same side. With your Nazi prejudice, fact denial, ad hominem, emotionally based arguments; I thought you were one of them.

But when they banned me without cause (again, they lied about the reason) you called them out and held them to task. There clearly was a bias, and I was really surprised at how well you stuck to your guns about it, you defiantly told the truth and cited facts that they couldn't escape. You and many others lead the charge that caused them to have to duck and cover, lie, and ultimately abuse the banhammer to silence dissent. This was the fight that I was fighting, the pursuit of truth. (That's actually why I went with this name, to smoke out the free speech fakers).

I was watching the entire time, silenced by another fraudulent ban. You hit them broadside with facts. I watched them reel and try to think of ways to intimidate and silence. You stood your ground brilliantly, despite ally after ally falling victim to their administrative abuse. Thank you for your hard work, honesty, and dedication.

And as much as you don't want to hear it, I did find out one thing.

(They're Jewish )

body: I wouldn't take anything crapathianfaggot says seriously. He's a major troll who is almost never serious. He is actually one of the admins' best buddies.
body_html: I wouldn't take anything crapathianfaggot says seriously. He's a major troll who is almost never serious. He is actually one of the admins' best buddies.

parent.body:
I must admit. I **never** thought we'd be fighting on the same side. With your Nazi prejudice, fact denial, ad hominem, emotionally based arguments; I thought you were one of them. 

But when they banned me without cause (again, they lied about the reason) you called them out and held them to task. There clearly was a bias, and I was really surprised at how well you stuck to your guns about it, you defiantly told the truth and cited facts that they couldn't escape. You and many others lead the charge that caused them to have to duck and cover, lie, and ultimately abuse the banhammer to silence dissent. This was the fight that I was fighting, the pursuit of truth. (That's actually why I went with this name, to smoke out the free speech fakers). 

I was watching the entire time, silenced by another fraudulent ban. You hit them broadside with facts. I watched them reel and try to think of ways to intimidate and silence. You stood your ground brilliantly, despite ally after ally falling victim to their administrative abuse. Thank you for your hard work, honesty, and dedication. 

And as much as you don't want to hear it, I did find out one thing. 

(They're [Jewish](https://ruqqus.com/+DumpsterFire/post/5uh3/new-users-see-the-following-screen/kib3?context=3) )
